application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Pine (applicants ref. T1) - Approx 9m. Remove dead wood throughout crown.  Reduce back house side by 1.2m. Reduce remaining overlong branches back into main crown structure 1.2m. Lightly thin crown density by up to 20%.1 x Laurel (applicants ref. T2) - Approx 6m. Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches overhanging pavement by 1.2m.  Raise over pavement by 1m to provide sufficient clearance. Reduce height by 2.5m-3m to separate crown from pines.1 x Pine (applicants ref. T3) - Approx 7m. Remove dead wood throughout crown. Reduce over extended branches by up to 1.2m. Lightly thin crown density by 20%.1 x Pyracantha (applicants ref. S1) - Reduce one large lateral branch growing into the cotoneaster by 3m to clear. Reduce remaining shrub to tidy.1 x Cotoneaster (applicants ref. T4) - Approx 5m. Reduce crown by 1.2m. Remove climbing plants.1 x Sorbus (applicants ref. T5) - Reduce crown by up to 1.2m.  Thin crown density by 20%.  Remove major dead wood. 2 x Damsons (applicants ref. T6, T7) - Reduce crowns by up to 1.2m.  Thin crown density by 20%. Remove major dead wood.1 x Amelanchier (applicants ref. T8) - Approx 4m. Remove dead wood.  Thin crown density by up to 20%, removing rubbing, crossing and diseased branches.1 x Laurel (applicants ref. T9) - Approx 3m. Trim to tidy.1 x Prunus (applicants ref. T10) - Approx 5m. Tip prune by up to 1m to shape.  Thin crown density by up to 30%.  Remove dead wood throughout.1 x Cotoneaste (applicants ref. T11) - Approx 6m. Reduce height by 1.2m. Tip prune remaining crown up to 1m to shape and tidy.1 x Laurel Hedge (applicants ref. G1) - Approx 5m. Trim to tidy.1 x Laurel (applicants ref. T12) - Approx 6m. Trim to tidy. Reduce by 1.2m.1 x Acer (applicants ref. T13) Approx 8m. Thin crown density throughout by 20-25%. Clear telephone lines as is practicable without undue disturbance of main branch scaffold. Raise crown up to 0.75m. Reduce overlong branches by up to 1.2m-1.4m.
